definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
the Ili river basin around Turpan in Xinjiang/abbr. for 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture
Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture in Xinjiang
pinyin: Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: Lopnur nahiyisi or Yuli county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
to start plowing/to plow the first furrow
Lopnur nahiyisi or Yuli county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Treaty of Saint Petersburg of 1881, whereby Russia handed back Yili province to Qing China in exchange for compensation payment and unequal treaty rights
pinyin: Zhong1 E2 Yi1 li2 Tiao2 yue1

definition: the Yili basin around Urumqi in Xinjiang

sentences.english: The plow was pulled by a yoke of oxen.
sentences.chinese: 一对公牛同轭拉着一头犁。

sentences.english: Farm machines that use fossil fuels, like blows plows and tractors, would not be needed either.
sentences.chinese: 用石油驱动的农机，比如犁和拖拉机，也不需要了。

sentences.english: When we arrive, we see a motorized plough sitting in a sea of weeds.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达的时候，看到一个电动犁躺在一堆杂草中间。

sentences.english: One horse and one cow were teamed to a plow.
sentences.chinese: 一匹马一头牛被套在犁上。

sentences.english: Then the ground gets ploughed up and the recultivated site will be ready for agricultural purposes in several years.
sentences.chinese: 然后土地被犁过，为几年后的农业种植做准备。

sentences.english: The plough dug a series of furrows across the field.
sentences.chinese: 犁穿过田地时挖出了一道道的犁沟。

sentences.english: Whoever plows with a team of donkeys must have patience.
sentences.chinese: 谁犁的和驴队必须有耐心。

sentences.english: Traditional farming system with a plough has restricted the development of agriculture in our country.
sentences.chinese: 以铧式犁为主的传统耕作制度制约着我国农业的发展。

sentences.english: Want it be grand when that day comes that we humans will hammer our swords into plow shears!
sentences.chinese: 真希望有一天我们的剑会变成改造世界的犁。

sentences.english: This paper primary coverage is truncates in the process in the plow the cutting tool best clearance angle research.
sentences.chinese: 是在犁削过程中刀具的最佳后角的研究。

sentences.english: The peasants ploughed the weeds in the field back to enrich the soil.
sentences.chinese: 农民把地里的杂草犁入土中来肥田地。

sentences.english: Four feet off the ground instead of Ta Kong, a shoulder plow instead of dressing.
sentences.chinese: 四足离地而不踏空，一肩负犁而不虚有。

sentences.english: The water buffalo squelched up and down the paddy fields, pulling the plough.
sentences.chinese: 水牛拉著犁，在稻田里咕唧咕唧地走著。

sentences.english: Odysseus immediately made a semi-circle with his plough to avoid injuring his son.
sentences.chinese: 奥德赛立刻将他的犁转半圈，以避免伤害他的儿子。

sentences.english: And Jesus said unto him, No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣说，手扶着犁向后看的，不配进神的国。

sentences.english: The "plow pan" on the farmlands in dry-farming areas is a serious problem to the agricultural production.
sentences.chinese: 旱作区耕地的“犁底层”已成为农业耕作的一大障碍。

definition: to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
a hoe/to hoe or dig/to weed/to get rid of
to put one's hand to the plow
